data:
HP 27es LED Backlit Monitor

LKR 42,000.00
  • » Model:HP 27es LED Backlit Monitor
  • » Other Features:>> Display size (diagonal) - 27"
    >> Resolution - 1920 x1080 @60Hz (Full HD)
    >> Display colors - Up to 16.7 million colors supported (through FRC technology)
    >> Display type - IPS w/ LED backlight
    >> Tilt and swivel angle - Tilt: -5 to +25°
    >> Aspect ratio - 16:9
    >> Pixel pitch - 0.311 mm
    >> Response time - 7 ms gray to gray
    >> Display scan frequency (vertical) - Up to 60 Hz
    >> Brightness - 250 cd/m²
    >> Contrast ratio - 1000:1 static; 1000000:1 dynamic
    >> Input Connectors - 1 VGA / 2 HDMI
    >> Warranty - 3 years limited warranty
title: HP 27es LED Backlit Monitor
